      • playSoundOnClient

        public void playSoundOnClient(java.lang.String soundMethod,
                     java.lang.String filePath,
                     decoworld.model.world.Coordinate coordinate,
                     decoworld.protocol.resources.ClientConnection client)
        Plays a given sound file on a specific client by matching up the world and coordinate.
        Parameters:
        filePath - path of the sound file.
        coordinate - location of the object or entity playing the sound.
        client - client to play sound on.
